title: (x) typeface in website menu bar - Tahoma {Si}
content:
Good Morning!

Help me identify the typeface for the menu bar please.  
The typeface currently in use for the “Bank Services” button is incorrect,  
please help me find a good match.  
Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [menu-bar.gif](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=menu-bar.gif) | 11.57 KB |
author: kylie

comments.content: I would guess that it is Verdana but at a larger point size than your “Bank Services”

Something that should have been an Ultrafont.

hhp

Too narrow to be Verdana. Likely Tahoma gone through Photoshop.

Si

Yep, it does look alot like Tahoma. =)  
MANY THANKS to all of you for helping.
